channel.title: Rar on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Rar on TLDRBins

item.title: Compressed Files
item.description: Hint: Always put the zip file inside a new folder before unzip zip tar.gz tar gz rar 7z bz # zip a file zip <FILE>.zip <FILE> # zip a folder zip -r <FOLDER>.zip <FOLDER>/ # zip a symlink (not the destination file) zip --symlinks file.zip <SYMLINK> # List files without unzip unzip -l <FILE> # unzip unzip <FILE> # zip (Windows) Compress-Archive -Path "<FILE_PATH>" -DestinationPath "<DEST_PATH>" # zip a folder (Windows) Add-Type -Assembly System.
